description: A police officer investigates a domestic dispute where a jealous twin accuses her sisters husband of attempted murder, leading to a psychological mystery.
Two newlywed brides go missing on a chaotic train journey in 2001 India, sparking a humorous and satirical investigation into gender norms.
A banker embarks on an unconventional quest to improve his familys future, confronting social hurdles and personal dilemmas.
A detective with a troubled past investigates a series of disappearances in a quiet coastal town, uncovering secrets that challenge everything he believes.
In a dystopian future, a bounty hunter is assigned to stop the delivery of a pregnant woman whose child might reshape society.
A deadly forest ghost returns to terrorize a town, blending scares with comedy as villagers fight back against supernatural forces.
Rooh Baba enters a haunted estate in Kolkata where two ghosts claim to be the same spirit, giving rise to hilarious and spooky chaos.
A new mission reunites Singham with his allies to dismantle a powerful criminal syndicate threatening public order.
Pushpa rises further in the world of smuggling, facing fierce rivals and corruption in a battle for power and survival.
Indian Air Force pilots navigate personal and political tensions following high-stakes aerial missions against threats across the border.
Based on traditional Assamese folk tales, this film weaves dark and mystical stories of love, loss, and revenge in rural Assam.
Years after Maximus's death, Luciusnow a grown manis drawn into the brutal world of the Roman arena, where he must fight for survival and legacy.
A young girl in rural Assam dreams of owning a guitar and forming a rock band, overcoming challenges with determination and hope.
Set in 1930s Mississippi, a family battles a seductive viral curse tied to vampiric folklore in a gripping supernatural thriller.
Three engineering students navigate the pressures of academic life while exploring friendship, love, and the meaning of success.
In a surreal New Mexico town during the COVID-19 era, tensions flare between a sheriff and mayor as social decay sets in.
The story follows Rizwan Khan, a man with Aspergers syndrome, who embarks on a journey across America to meet the President and clear his name after being mistaken as a terrorist.
On the first day of the alien apocalypse, a lone survivor navigates chaos and danger in New York City to find safety.
A new generation faces deaths intricate designs after disturbing premonitions threaten their lives in everyday settings.
Barbie steps out of her perfect world to discover real lifes complexities, challenging ideas of identity and purpose.
